long_description: From the playground to the mountains, kids will love the Pepper's Tony Polarized Sunglasses. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Shiny Black frames feature gray lenses. Grey/Camo frames feature brown lenses. Triacetate lens construction sandwiches a polyvinyl acetate layer between 2 outer acetate layers. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof polycarbonate frames are strong and acid- and heat-resistant.
short_description: From the playground to the mountains, kids will love the Pepper's Tony Polarized Sunglasses.
